title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4034 - Starting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4034 - Starting

State Regulations
§ 4034.1 - Duties of starter
§ 4034.2 - Failure of horse to start
§ 4034.3 - Persons excluded from course
§ 4034.4 - Time signals
§ 4034.5 - Parade to the post
§ 4034.6 - Horses led to the post
§ 4034.7 - Determination of starting position
§ 4034.8 - Starting vicious horse
§ 4034.9 - Accident at the post
§ 4034.10 - Starting gate
§ 4034.11 - Starting in front of the post
§ 4034.12 - Horses to be schooled before starting
§ 4034.13 - Position at starting post
§ 4034.14 - Matters to be referred to stewards
§ 4034.15 - Statements by starter conclusive

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4034

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1934, ch. 310, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
